steps.title: Ankle bracelets are a fashion statement.
steps.content: Ankle bracelets are a fashion statement. In general, ankle bracelets don’t have a specific meaning in modern Western society. They’re just worn as a fashion accessory to add some fun to an outfit and draw attention to the legs and feet.

steps.title: An anklet may indicate that you're easygoing.
steps.content: An anklet may indicate that you're easygoing. Anklets are often associated with bohemian fashion, and in general, people who dress in this style tend to be very mellow and go with the flow. If you wear an ankle bracelet, people might assume you have similar views on life. [1] X Research source

steps.title: An anklet on your right ankle might mean you’re single.
steps.content: An anklet on your right ankle might mean you’re single. While ankle bracelets don’t typically have an official meaning in the Western world, some people believe wearing an anklet on your right ankle means you’re single and actively seeking a relationship. Alternatively, wearing an ankle bracelet on your left ankle can indicate you’re married or in a committed relationship. In some cultures, these meanings are reversed; married women wear anklets on their right ankle, while unmarried women wear them on their left.

steps.title: Men may wear ankle bracelets to reject gender roles.
steps.content: Men may wear ankle bracelets to reject gender roles. Traditionally, ankle bracelets have been a feminine accessory mostly worn by women. These days, men may wear them to defy societal expectations, express themselves, and create their own values. [2] X Research source Some people also believe that wearing an ankle bracelet on your left ankle means you’re a member of the LGBT+ community, but this doesn’t seem to be a widely held belief.

steps.title: In Ancient Egypt, ankle bracelets represented social class.
steps.content: In Ancient Egypt, ankle bracelets represented social class. Women wore silver or gold ankle bracelets to indicate their husbands were wealthy. On the other hand, slaves sometimes wore anklets made of leather. [3] X Research source In some other African cultures, husbands gave their wives ankle bracelets to symbolize their commitment.

steps.title: In Hinduism, ankle bracelets offer protection.
steps.content: In Hinduism, ankle bracelets offer protection. Wearing an ankle bracelet on your left ankle serves as a talisman against illness and bad omens. [4] X Research source Similarly, some Native American tribes believed wearing an ankle bracelet with a feather brought good luck and warded off negative energy.

steps.title: In some Indian cultures, an anklet on the left ankle represents femininity.
steps.content: In some Indian cultures, an anklet on the left ankle represents femininity. In these beliefs, the left side of the body is associated with the female spirit and intuition, so many women wear an ankle bracelet on the left ankle to enhance their feminine qualities and sensuality. In Hindu culture, women are often gifted ankle bracelets and charms as wedding gifts to bless them with fertility and good fortune.

steps.title: In Taoism and Daoism, ankle bracelets promote positive energy.
steps.content: In Taoism and Daoism, ankle bracelets promote positive energy. Wearing an anklet on the right ankle helps balance your chi, or your life energy, and brings positivity to your life.

steps.title: Protection
steps.content: Protection Shield yourself from negativity by wearing an ankle bracelet. If you’re prone to negative thought patterns, ankle bracelets can help shield you from bag energy so you can focus on the positive.

steps.title: Good luck
steps.content: Good luck Wearing an ankle bracelet helps you attract positivity into your life. They’re a sign that good things are coming and that your life will change for the better. They also encourage you to stop and smell the roses. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Wealth and prosperity
steps.content: Wealth and prosperity Just as ankle bracelets can attract good luck, they can also attract money. If you want or need some extra cash or financial help, wear a gold anklet to bring prosperity. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Clarity
steps.content: Clarity When you’re confused about a situation or need to find the right answer, wearing a silver anklet can help. Silver anklets help clear your mind and provide assurance from the spiritual world. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Courage
steps.content: Courage Ankle bracelets encourage you to stick to your conviction. They tell you to never back down from your decisions and goals no matter how others discourage you.

steps.title: Love and fertility
steps.content: Love and fertility Anklets often represent devotion and relationships. Wearing one helps recharge your romantic energy to improve excitement and intimacy in your relationship. They’re also known to encourage fertility. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Wear an ankle bracelet at a casual event or location.
steps.content: Wear an ankle bracelet at a casual event or location. Ankle bracelets are a great way to draw attention to your legs, so many people wear them at the beach or by the pool. Wear them on vacation, at a party, or at a music festival to show off your style. [9] X Research source You can wear an anklet on either the right or left side. In general, wear your ankle bracelet on a bare leg. While you can opt to wear an anklet under your pants if you need to keep it hidden, people generally avoid wearing them with pantyhose. Choose an ankle bracelet that complements your shoes. Try wearing one with sandals or flip-flops rather than ankle boots or sneakers.

steps.title: Avoid wearing an ankle bracelet in a professional setting.
steps.content: Avoid wearing an ankle bracelet in a professional setting. Because anklets are associated with a laidback lifestyle and some have charms that make noise, it’s probably not a good idea to wear them to work or in quiet public places like libraries. [10] X Research source Ankle bracelets aren’t attached to a specific culture or belief system, so you don’t have to worry about cultural appropriation when wearing them. Just be considerate of those around you if your anklet makes noise.
